page.title: 18AN EIGHT YEAR OLD'S VIEW
page.content: I'm eight years old and I love living here. I hate big towns. I can just go down the road to my friend's house and there are hundreds of trees. We often go into the woods and play with guns,toy guns of course. Its near to nice places and I don't want to leave here ever. It's easy to go to the sea and we go sailing a lot, we can soon get to the Isle of Wight. We learn to row boats and Dad relies on me now to bring passengers from the shore to our boat. Next week I'm going to be invested in the Cubs and its really nice at Cubs. We go trekking, play games and I have been to one camp,we didn't cook. It was at a farm and we had a mini whirlwind, all the grass which had just been cut, blew all around the tent and in our faces. I had fish and chips when I got home.
